name: Starbucks Classic White Ceramic Mug
description: A timeless white ceramic mug featuring the iconic Starbucks siren logo. Perfect for your morning coffee ritual at home. Holds 11 oz and is dishwasher safe.

name: Starbucks Pike Place Roast Mug
description: Inspired by the original 1971 Pike Place store, this rich cobalt blue mug celebrates Starbucks' heritage. Features vintage-style artwork and holds 12 oz. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Starbucks Reserve Copper Ombre Mug
description: An elegant copper-toned ombre mug from the Starbucks Reserve collection. The gradient finish adds a touch of sophistication to any kitchen. Holds 10 oz. Hand wash recommended.

name: Starbucks Holiday Blend Red Mug
description: Bring the festive spirit to your coffee break with this limited-edition holiday red mug. Adorned with seasonal snowflake patterns and the Starbucks wordmark. Holds 12 oz. Dishwasher safe.

name: Starbucks You Are Here Collection Mug
description: Part of the iconic You Are Here collection, this colorful mug features illustrated landmarks and local scenes. A great collector's item for coffee lovers and travelers alike. Holds 14 oz.

name: Starbucks Anniversary Blend Black Mug
description: Commemorating decades of Starbucks' passion for coffee, this matte black mug features the anniversary logo etched in gold. A premium addition to any mug collection. Holds 11 oz. Hand wash recommended.
